abstract: The following rand3m notes on birds from the vicinity of Missoula sere obtained between OctoborX 19172 and JuneX 191S, while 6erving as Assistant Protessor of Biclogy at the University of Montana. The list is, of course, very lncomplete. No spec imens 7ere preserved. Colpbus nigricollis califo,nicus-Eared Grebe.-I sas a juvenile which had been found June 2, 1918, on the-prairie in the Bitterroot aralley over a mile from the nearest stream. It could not rise froa the g;round. and seemed ble to fly even when throwtl into the air. ActitiS macularia. Spottod Sandpiper.-May 29 and 3l, 1918, along stream shores Qt Missoula.
